name: Dr Heavy
description:
Group Name - Addictive Cheetahs 

Are you an individual who has suffered the effects of noodle arms affecting your daily life? Struggling to lift bro? feeling weighed down by your infinite wimpy loneliness? THEN YOU SHOULD COME DOWN TO DR. HEAVY’S MUSCLE-UP GYMNASIUM!! Tall piles of laundry? BAM! Heavy boxes of equipment? EASY! THE EMPIRE STATE BUILDING?!! Bodacious! With the Doc’s help, you too can start your journey to RADICAL GLORY!!You play as Axel, an AMPED young man who needs help to prepare for the Annual Squatacon when he finds this advertisement for Dr. Heavy’s Gym. Train up with the help of the acclaimed muscle-up professional in this squat-themed clicker game to conquer progressively heavy items by clicking to help Axel feel the burn and show the world what he is truly made of.
